text: Polyalthia angustissima is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is a tree found in Malaysia, Singapore, and possibly Vietnam.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Polyalthia angustissima. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== angustissima Category:Trees of Malaya Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polyalthia angustissima
